entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northeast 30 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Saturday 25 March 2023
